samples.question: And do you think people depend on cell phone apps too much these days?
samples.transcript: Yes, one example is the map function on your computer, the navigations. So when you go on a trip, if you depend too much on your app to find roads, to find a way to something, you do not really remember how you get there. And also cameras one example. The more camera you use to take pictures, the less time you spend, like actually viewing the travel, the place you went for travel. Sure.

samples.question: And are you working or are you a student?

samples.question: And what do you like to do when you have some free time?
samples.transcript: I like to listen to some music. I am also a singer myself, so I practice singing as well. Now we are going to talk about public transportation.

samples.question: So what kind of public transport do you usually take?
samples.transcript: So there are a few options in Korea if you want to take public transportation. My favorite one is the subway, Because it always, makes you get places on time. And unlike the bus, there is no traffic or, unexpected events that you need to consider when moving.

samples.question: And when do you usually take public transport?
samples.transcript: I take public transport I think most of the time when I need to get to places, when my parents are not able to take me, give me a right, and because I have a driver's license, I can drive, but I would say I take the public transport when my parents do not trust me with their cars.

samples.question: And do you think most people in your country prefer public transportation or private transportation?

samples.question: Could you clarify what you mean by customer service?
samples.transcript: Yeah so when people go shopping like what sort of service do people usually expect a good customer service Well I guess you would have to be nice and be able to give answers to people queries like where is this shop yeah I think that would be like kind of the basics that people would expect And what do you think people should do if the customer service they receive is not satisfactory? There would be a few ways to deal with that kind of problem. well the shop might have like a complaint service themselves, where they can like write, like a short comment on their website or submit it to their superior. otherwise there might be out of store review system where you can share your opinion with other customers who might think about going there. but maybe you do not want to encourage them as much.

samples.question: And what do you think are the differences between shopping online and shopping in store?
samples.transcript: The biggest difference might be that you cannot try those clothes on. I think the, camera technology has, evolved very much so that you can kind of feel the texture through screen. I think that, kind of problem has been, less of a nuisance for a couple of years. but I think still being able to try it on yourself and see how it fits. Is kind of like the, biggest crucial, thing that kind of divides the shopping styles.

samples.question: Tell me, what do you usually do in your free time, Homan?

samples.question: Do you prefer relaxing activities or more active ones?
samples.transcript: I think I prefer relaxing activities more because as a long day at work, I usually feel tired, so I just want to go home and chill out. I, often listen to music and watch movies on Netflix with a cup of tea on my sofa. It makes me feel relaxed and unwind.
